measured_by: Corrected Recognition (CR) score in a continuous recognition memory task
justification: "The memorability score of each food item was calculated as Corrected Recognition (CR), which is the hit rate minus the false alarm rate for trials where the image was assigned as the target."

measured_by: Corrected Recognition (CR) score in a word-based continuous recognition task
justification: For the word stimuli, "The memorability task followed the same procedures in Experiment 1A," and the same CR analysis was applied to derive word memorability scores.
Participants "rated each image on a scale from 0 to 10, with 0 being 'does not match at all' and 10 being 'perfect match'," providing a numeric measure of representativeness.
During the rating phase, participants "were asked to rate all 138 food stimuli on a scale from 0 to 10 for how much they would prefer to eat that food today."
